extendedInfo.description: Finally, the #1 cocktail recipe app for the iPhone has come to Android! Whether you're a novice bartender or a full-blown mixologist, you've got to download this app.â THOUSANDS OF RECIPESBrowse and search through 7,900+ drink & cocktail recipes and 1,300+ ingredients.â METRIC/IMPERIAL UNITSMetric and Imperial (US) units can be chosen for all drink recipes with the click of one button on the "More" tab.â LIQUOR CABINETThe "Liquor Cabinet" tab lets you enter all the liquor and mixer types you have on hand--and search the entire database for all the cocktails you're able to make.â RANDOM DRINKSThe "Random" tab has a slot-machine interface, which lets you find random cocktail recipes based on liquor, mixer, and glassware criteria. The Cabinet and Random features are user-friendly because we've broken down 1,300+ ingredients into 87 categories.â LIQUOR STORE LOCATORFind nearby liquor stores using Google maps and GPS.â DRINK RECIPE CATEGORIESCocktails, Martinis, Shooters, Jello Shots, Hot Drinks, Punches, Non-Alcoholic, and Favorites.â LEARN BARTENDING TERMINOLOGY & TECHNIQUESThe "Bartending" tab supplies info on Glassware, Tools of the Trade, Terminology, How to Stock Your Bar, and Bartending Tips & Tricks.â AWARD WINNING APPOver 8500 articles have been written about our drink recipe apps...in books, magazines, and web sites from the likes of Gizmodo.com, Mashable.com, Time Magazine, and O'Reilly Media. Furthermore, our team includes a veteran of the food and beverage industry.â APP TO SDYou may move this app to your SD card to save space on your phone. However, you may not move the 6 MB database, just everything else. Moving the database to the SD card is wrong on multiple levels. Please accept this fact and enjoy the app! Thanks.(From the creators of Mixologist)

reviews.title: Needs access to personal info?
reviews.comment: Used to like this app and put up with its ads since it was actually useful. But now it wants to access my information /without/ my knowledge or permission!? No thanks, I\'ll just go use Google, Wikipedia, and people to get my drink recipes.
reviews.author: Andy Masotto

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: It\'s great to find cocktails I can make with what I have on hand.
reviews.author: Joanne Freda

reviews.title: Gr8
reviews.comment: Very useful
reviews.author: sidh xec

reviews.title: strong foundation
reviews.comment: plenty of worthwhile knowledge inside however when you move an app from iOS to android you take out things like in app back buttons... we have more than one button at your disposal here on the open source project... get rid of the iOS leftovers and update the ui to at least 2012 era and it\'s a five star application
reviews.author: Josh Hirner

reviews.comment: So far this application has worked really well. It can be fun at parties.
reviews.author: Brian Kallhoff

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: But needs to be updated with newer drinks and for different mixers and liquor.
reviews.author: Dakota Bohrer

reviews.title: Amazing app!
reviews.comment: Has all the drinks I know listed.
reviews.author: Joshua Fratrik

reviews.comment: Send email from my account without my knowledge? No app gets those kind of permissions without a serious reason.   Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Thomas Mokrzecki

reviews.comment: Too many moving/animated ads with shakes, stutters, sirens
reviews.author: Rocco Corsetti

reviews.title: Good one
reviews.comment: Its informative and very helpful
reviews.author: santhosh kumar

reviews.comment: Good app
reviews.author: Intl Sem\303\251

reviews.title: Let\'s get wasted
reviews.comment: As a bartender in training, this is a perfect aide
reviews.author: Ernest Favors

reviews.title: It\'s okay
reviews.comment: It\'s okay
reviews.author: Demario Johnson

reviews.title: Not bad, BUT
reviews.comment: Runs only in portrait, not landscape. It is great that I can add my own drinks, but there is no backup facility. Lots of drinks to choose from is a big plus.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Party!
reviews.comment: You know when your at party and you have a bunch of liquor n mixures but don\'t know what drinks to make? Well now its easy to do! Liquid panty removers all around!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Political petition?! Are you kidding me?
reviews.comment: Well you instantly turned off a large set of users. First startup I received a petition asking me to join the fight against Obamacare. For or against, this it\'s extremely rude.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: not too bad
reviews.comment: Love the app, but I would like the ability to use the random feature on only the cabinet list, not the entire database. Then I can randomly land on something  I actually have the stuff to make!
reviews.author: Jeremy Williams

reviews.title: Check new permissions.
reviews.comment: Don\'t understand how minor bug fixes = add new permissions to access my personal data.  Won\'t update to this new version until an explanation is given.
reviews.author: Jesse Jones

reviews.title: Cheeky Sods
reviews.comment: No way Im giving permission to e-mail my contacts without consent. Used to enjoy this app but now uninstalled.
reviews.author: Rob Gunn

reviews.title: When it works??
reviews.comment: I like it when it works but that\'s less than 20% of the time. I won\'t consider buying because the free version is unreliable. Motorola Photon
reviews.author: A Google User
